page.title: 03Family Life In Thorntree.
page.content: We live in a terraced house.I have one brother and sister.My brother is fourteen and he goes to {Langbaurgh.} My sister goes to {Caldicotes}she is 11 years old and in September she is going to {Langbaurgh.}I am in { {Caldicotes}.Iam ten years old and Iam a third year junior.My mam is unenployed and she is 48 years old she sees my other sisters baby on Mondays, Wednesdays and sometimes on Saturdays.On Tuesdays my mam and my dad go to the market and get fruit and vegtables.On Thursdays my mam and dad go shopping to {Asda},{Finefare}and{ {Gateway.}On Friday my mam and dad go to Paulines sisters shop for their dinner.On Sunday me,Pauline,Terence and mam have a Sunday dinner together and dad has his dinner after he has been to the club.
